trans-unit.source: Represents an admissible value of an <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumProperty"></xref>.
Default constructor.
Required for XAML deserialization.
Gets or sets the list of arguments for this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue"></xref>.
This field is optional.
Returns the list of arguments.
Gets or sets the description of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref> for use by a prospective UI client.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
Returns the description.
Gets or sets the name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue"></xref>.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
When this property is not set, it is assigned the same value as the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue.Name%2A> property (and, therefore, would not be localized).
Returns the name.
Gets or sets Help information for this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue"></xref>.
Can be used to specify a Help URL.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
Returns the Help information.

Gets or sets a flag that determines whether this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue"></xref> is the default value for the associated <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumProperty"></xref>.
This field is optional and its default value is `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the enum value is the default value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets additional attributes of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue"></xref>.
This property can be used as a grab bag for additional metadata of this value that are not captured by the primary fields.
A custom UI is required to interpret the additional metadata because the included UI formats are not aware of them.
This field is optional.
Returns the additional attributes.
Gets or sets the name of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumValue"></xref>.
This field is mandatory and culture-invariant.
Returns the name.
Gets or sets a switch representation of this property for the case when the parent <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumProperty"></xref> represents a tool parameter.
This field is optional and culture-invariant.
Returns the switch representation.
Gets or sets the prefix for the switch representation of this value for the case when the parent <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.EnumProperty"></xref> represents a tool parameter.
This field is optional and culture-invariant.
Returns the switch prefix.
